introduction.heading: Introduction
content: At {APP_NAME}, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and protection of your personal information when you use our service.
By using {APP_NAME}, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

sections.heading: Information Collection
content: We collect only the minimum information necessary to provide you with our service:

items: Authentication information when you sign in through third-party providers
Basic profile information (name, email) for account creation
Technical information necessary for the service to function

sections.heading: Use of Information
content: Your information is used exclusively for:

items: Communicating with you about service-related matters

sections.heading: Data Protection
content: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information:

items: Strict access controls and authentication protocols

sections.heading: Data Sharing
content: We do not share your personal information with third parties.
We do not sell or rent your personal data to anyone.
Your information is only used for the purposes explicitly stated in this policy.

sections.heading: Data Retention
content: We retain your information only as long as necessary to provide you with our service.
You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time.
Upon account deletion, we will remove all personal information from our systems within 30 days.

sections.heading: Your Rights
content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

items: Right to access your personal information
Right to request correction of inaccurate data
Right to request deletion of your data
Right to withdraw consent for data processing

sections.heading: Cookies and Tracking
content: We use only essential cookies necessary for the service to function properly.
We do not use tracking cookies or analytics that collect personal information.
You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
Continued use of our service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

footer.text: This privacy policy is effective as of January 10, 2025 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future.
